resources.string: " Kids Picture Book and spelling Learner is a Educational picture book. For Kids to learn spellings as well as pronouncing words. \n\n Kids Picture Book is also a fun way of learning new things, it is a complete kids learning book ,it contain so many colorful pictures which will helps the kids to understand the spellings as well as pronouncing words. In this picture book kids will help to pronounce each words very easily. We are creating with picture book to understand each and every pictures and words very easily. Kids can easily catch up each and every words. Each letter contain sound. It can easily Understand the spelling of the word. In this picture book contain more than 300+ of different colorful pictures and words."
